successes.title: Leikr: The new Danish designed GPS sports watch
successes.description: 1st GPS watch w/ color maps on a 2” screen, Leikr challenges how intuitive a watch can get: one-glance display, downloadable workouts.

Pledges.description: BE A LEIKR RUNNER • Receive a high quality Leikr runner jersey in your choice of size.  Get featured on the list of Leikr Friends at Leikr.com for helping support the effort. Free shipping to the US.
BE A LEIKR RIDER • Receive a high quality Leikr cycling jersey in your choice of size. You will also get featured on the list of Leikr Friends at Leikr.com. Free shipping to the US.

THE VERY FIRST LEIKRS • Be one of the first to order and help make this funding a success.  You will also be at the very front of the line to get your production Leikr watch as it comes off the line.   Free shipping to the US.

THE VERY FIRST LEIKRS (2nd Round) • Did that first batch of devices pass you by?  We want to support our early adopters and are thus offering this additional reward.  Be one of the first funders and get your production Leikr watch before anyone else.   Free shipping to the US.
SUPER EARLY BIRDS SPECIAL• Help get this effort moving while also being among the first ones to get a production Leikr watch as it comes off the line. Free shipping to the US.
EARLY BIRDS SPECIAL• Help get this effort moving while also being among the first ones to get a production Leikr watch as it comes off the line.  Free shipping to the US.
THE LAST TRAIN • Still at a $100 off of the retail price, be sure to get your Leikr watch and support this innovative project . Free shipping to the US.

BETA TEST LEIKRS: Be an integral part of the Leikr team and help us test the R&D build of Leikr devices.  Units will be fully functional with beta builds of software, we will provide frequent software updates based on your feedback and testing results. Free shipping in the USA.
SPECIAL EDITION: ARCTIC WHITE AND RUSH RED • Be one of the few to get a Leikr watch in a limited edition with our exclusive color combination Arctic White and Rush Red.  Free shipping to the US.
SPECIAL EDITION: ARCTIC WHITE AND OCEAN BLUE • Be one of the few to get a Leikr watch in a limited edition with our exclusive color combination Arctic White and Ocean Blue.  Free shipping to USA.

OPEN MAPS DEVELOPMENT KIT: receive a  special edition of the Leikr watch that enables you use your own generated maps directly on the device. For trail running, hiking, skiing, marine sports, and whoever  wants to explore open maps development.
Free shipping to the USA.
SPECIAL EDITION: ATOMIC ORANGE • Be one of the "very few" to get a Leikr watch in a limited monocromatic edition: Atomic Orange.  Free shipping to USA.

YOUR VERY PERSONAL LEIKR • Get your Leikr with your own personal engraving on the back plate or strap. Your motto, your name and ID, or the logo of your team, to make your like a unique piece.  Free shipping to USA.

BE PART OF THE LEIKR TEAM • Come and visit us in our Headquarters in Copenhagen and participate in a 2 day workshop where we will discuss the next generation of Leikr products. We would love to hear your voice and ideas (afterwork social activities are included).  Airfare and accommodations included for 1 person.
